io.vertx.json.schema.common

Interface ValidatorFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllOfValidatorFactory, AnyOfValidatorFactory, BaseCombinatorsValidatorFactory, BaseFormatValidatorFactory, BaseSingleSchemaValidatorFactory, ConstValidatorFactory, ContainsValidatorFactory, ContainsValidatorFactory, DefinitionsValidatorFactory, DependenciesValidatorFactory, DependentRequiredValidatorFactory, DependentSchemasValidatorFactory, EnumValidatorFactory, ExclusiveMaximumValidatorFactory, ExclusiveMinimumValidatorFactory, FormatValidatorFactory, FormatValidatorFactory, FormatValidatorFactory, IfThenElseValidatorFactory, ItemsValidatorFactory, ItemsValidatorFactory, MaximumValidatorFactory, MaximumValidatorFactory, MaxItemsValidatorFactory, MaxLengthValidatorFactory, MaxPropertiesValidatorFactory, MinimumValidatorFactory, MinimumValidatorFactory, MinItemsValidatorFactory, MinLengthValidatorFactory, MinPropertiesValidatorFactory, MultipleOfValidatorFactory, NotValidatorFactory, NullableValidatorFactory, OneOfValidatorFactory, PatternValidatorFactory, PropertiesValidatorFactory, PropertyNamesValidatorFactory, RequiredValidatorFactory, TypeValidatorFactory, TypeValidatorFactory, UnevaluatedItemsValidatorFactory, UnevaluatedPropertiesValidatorFactory, UniqueItemsValidatorFactory

    public interface ValidatorFactory
    Factory for Validator. This is the entrypoint if you want to create a new custom keyword

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canConsumeSchema(JsonObject schema)
      Returns true if this factory can consume the provided schema, eventually returning an instance of Validator
      Validator createValidator(JsonObject schema, JsonPointer scope, SchemaParserInternal parser, MutableStateValidator parent)
      This method consume the schema eventually creating a new Validator.

    • Method Detail

      • createValidator

        Validator createValidator(JsonObject schema,
                          JsonPointer scope,
                          SchemaParserInternal parser,
                          MutableStateValidator parent)
                   throws SchemaException
        This method consume the schema eventually creating a new Validator. The schema parser calls it during schema parsing only if canConsumeSchema(JsonObject) returns true

        You can return any of SyncValidator, AsyncValidator or MutableStateValidator

        Parameters:
        schema - JsonObject representing the schema
        scope - scope of the parsed schema
        parser - caller parser
        parent - parent of this schema
        Returns:
        the created validator.
        Throws:
        SchemaException - if the keyword(s) handled by this ValidatorFactory are invalid

      • canConsumeSchema

        boolean canConsumeSchema(JsonObject schema)
        Returns true if this factory can consume the provided schema, eventually returning an instance of Validator
        Parameters:
        schema -
        Returns:
